title: Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Premium Hand Protection from Welder and Cutting Torch Heat, Commercial Quality, Cotton Lined, Gauntlet Cuff, Unisex, Grey, One Size
descriptions:
Introducing the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, the ultimate in heavy-duty hand protection. These gloves are designed to withstand the heat and flames of welders and cutting torches, keeping your hands safe and comfortable. 

Made with a durable, chemical resistant material, these gloves are built to last. The fully welted seams and lock-stitch construction ensure that they can endure even the toughest welding jobs. 

Featuring a long 13.5" gauntlet cuff, these gloves provide extra protection against fire sparks and grinding. They are specifically designed for MIG and stick welding applications, making them perfect for professionals and hobbyists alike. 

With a winged thumb for greater flexibility and Kevlar stitching, these gloves offer both comfort and durability. The exterior is made of split cowhide grade A leather, while the interior lining is crafted from soft cotton fleece. 

Each pack contains one pair of two gray gloves, suitable for both men and women. One size fits most, ensuring a comfortable fit for everyone. 

Choose the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 for premium hand protection and peace of mind during your welding projects.

Made with split cowhide grade A leather and a cotton fleece lining, these gloves are not only functional but also comfortable. This pack includes one pair of gray gloves that can be worn by both men and women. Upgrade your welding gear with the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641!

Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Premium Hand Protection from Welder and Cutting Torch Heat, Commercial Quality, Cotton Lined, Gauntlet Cuff, Unisex, Grey, One Size

MORE SPECS: Gloves have a winged thumb for greater flexibility and feature Kevlar stitching; Exterior is made of split cowhide grade A leather; Interior lining is made of cotton fleece

UNISEX STYLE: One pair of two gray gloves per pack; One size fits most and can be worn by men and women
